alert.note: Alert for Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 4:03AM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches. Local amounts up to 15 inches are possible. * WHERE...Upper North Platte River Basin. This includes the city of Saratoga. * WHEN...11 PM MST this evening until 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
